uls-desc: Ma deɛ wɔde di dwuma no akwan ahorohɔ so ma no yi ne kasa na won sesa  kasa no nhyehyeɛ
ext-uls-undo-language-tooltip-text-local: Kasa no a sesa ama wiki wei. Hwɛ wo [[Soronko:Deɛ wo pɛ no afanan nyinaa|deɛ wopɛ no afanan nyinaa]] na sesa kasa no ma wikis wei nyinaa.
uls-betafeature-desc: Yi kasa ahorow no mu kakra bi kyerɛ, nea ɛho hia wo no paa.
ext-uls-display-settings-desc: Sesa kasa a wɔde di dwuma ma menus ɛne nsaano nkyerɛwee.
ext-uls-language-buttons-help: Sesa kasa akuo. Kasa no asekyerɛ nsesa.
ext-uls-display-settings-anon-log-in-cta: [[Special:UserLogin|Log in]] na sesa kasa foforɔ ma menus no.
ext-uls-webfonts-settings-title: Twe atwerɛ sɛ ɛho hia a
ext-uls-webfonts-settings-info: Twe atwerɛdeɛ a ayera berɛ biara a woani nna wo ho so na ma no nyi atwerɛdeɛ biara a ɔpɛ
ext-uls-webfonts-select-for-ui-info: Atwerɛdeɛ a yɛde to ɔdedeɛ anim
ext-uls-input-settings-desc: Wo kyerɛw wɔ kasa foforo mu anaa?
ext-uls-ime-help: Sɛnea wo di bɛ yɛ adwuma
ext-uls-input-enable: Ma wura mu akadeɛ nyɛ awduma
ext-uls-input-disable-info: Akadeɛ a yɛde wura mu nnyɛ adwuma
ext-uls-input-settings-noime: Wura nu akwan biara nni hɔ ma kasa wei
ext-uls-input-disable-notification: Akadeɛ a yɛde wura mu no anyɛ adwuma
ext-uls-input-disable-notification-info-: Wobɛtumi adane wura mu akadeɛ kasa nhyehyeeɛ no aberɛ biara a wopɛ.
Wobɛtumi adae kasa akadeɛ wura mu nhyehyeeɛ a ɛbɛn kasa lese.
ext-uls-compact-link-info: Kasa ahorow nyinaa (nea amanfo anaa wo adikan afa da)
ext-uls-compact-language-links-preferenc: Fa [[$1|compact language list]], a ɛho hia wo.
ext-uls-compact-no-results: Beaeɛ yi nni kasa a worehwehwɛ no mu.
ext-uls-setlang-error: Mfomsoɔ bi siieɛ aberɛ a yɛrepɛ kasa a yɛpɛ no. $1
ext-uls-setlang-message: Ɔkwan a wo faa so srɛɛ nnianim a yɛn yi no wɔ mu $1 ($2)
